Rencana Sekuel 'Doctor Sleep' Mulai Dibahas
07 Nov 2019, 15:01 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Produsen 'Doctor Sleep' tampak ambisius akan masa depan film tersebut, dengan memulai membahas proyek sekuelnya meski baru juga rilis di bioskop. (dok. Warner Bros Pictures)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Produsen Doctor Sleep, Intrepid Pictures dan Vertigo Entertainment, tampak percaya diri atas film tersebut. Meski Doctor Sleep baru rilis, mereka disebut tengah mempersiapkan sekuel film tersebut.Kabar penggarapan sekuel film yang diadaptasi dari novel bertajuk sama karya Stephen king ini disampaikan oleh sutradara Mike Flanagan. Bahkan ia sudah berbicara dengan King soal cerita selanjutnya yang harus dibawa."Kami aktif berbicara tentang apa selanjutnya, dan kami memiliki ide yang bagus untuk itu, saya belum diizinkan untuk membicarakannya," kata Flanagan kepada CinemaBlend yang dilansir NME.Sutradara berusia 41 tahun ini melanjutkan, "Tapi itu sangat keren, dan saya berharap akan ada kesempatan untuk segera bermain dengan kotak pasir [alat penangkap hantu di Doctor Sleep] itu lagi."Lebih lanjut, Flanagan sangat senang bisa menjadi sutradara Doctor Sleep. Baginya menyutradarai film yang diadaptasi dari novel karya King adalah mimpi sejak kecil yang menjadi kenyataan.Ia sangat senang ketika King mengizinkan dirinya untuk bermain dengan kotak pasir. Sutradara asal Amerika Serikat ini akan senang untuk melakukan hal itu lagi.Doctor Sleep merupakan sekuel film The Shining (1980) yang juga diadaptasi dari novel bertajuk sama karya King. Pada film itu, karakter Danny Torrance yang masih kecil memiliki kemampuan supranatural yang disebut The Shining.Dalam Doctor Sleep, Danny (Ewan McGregor) sudah berusia 39 tahun. Ia berusaha menghilangkan jati diri sebagai The Shining dengan bekerja sebagai staf di salah satu rumah sakit.Kala itu, Danny merasa musuh terbesar saat ini adalah dirinya sendiri. Ia tak menyadari bahwa True Knot, kelompok yang memangsa The Shining, mengancam nyawa para The Shining, termasuk dirinya.




(adp/end)

'Doctor Sleep' Sequel Plan Begins Discussed
Nov 7 2019, 15:01 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The producer of 'Doctor Sleep' seems ambitious about the future of the film, by starting to discuss the sequel project even though it has also just been released in theaters. (doc. Warner Bros Pictures)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Producers of Doctor Sleep, Intrepid Pictures and Vertigo Entertainment, look confident about the film. Although Doctor Sleep has just been released, they are said to be preparing for the sequel to the film. The story of the film sequel adaptation of the novel entitled Stephen King's work was delivered by director Mike Flanagan. In fact he has talked to King about the next story that must be brought. "We are actively talking about what is next, and we have a good idea for that, I have not been allowed to talk about it," Flanagan told CinemaBlend as reported by NME. The 41-year-old director continued, "But that is very cool, and I hope there will be an opportunity to immediately play with the sandbox [the ghost capturing device in Doctor Sleep] again." Furthermore, Flanagan is very happy to be a director of Doctor Sleep. For him to direct a film adapted from a novel by King is a dream since childhood that came true. He was very happy when King allowed himself to play with the sandbox. The director from the United States will be happy to do that again. Doctor Sleep is a sequel to the film The Shining (1980) which is also adapted from the novel titled King's work. In the film, Danny Torrance's young character has a supernatural ability called The Shining. In Doctor Sleep, Danny (Ewan McGregor) is 39 years old. He tried to lose his identity as The Shining by working as a staff in one of the hospitals. At that time, Danny felt the biggest enemy at this time was himself. He did not realize that True Knot, the group that preyed on The Shining, threatened the lives of The Shining, including himself.
